mapper.insert: insert into demo_project.tb_chat_room (roomId, name, createBySeq, createByUserId, registDateTime) values (#{roomId}, #{name}, #{createBySeq}, #{createByUserId}, #{registDateTime})
mapper.select: select * from tb_chat_room r left join tb_chat_member m on r.roomId = m.roomId left join tb_chat_message tcm on r.roomId = tcm.roomId where r.roomId = #{roomId}
select roomId, name, createBySeq, createByUserId, registDateTime from demo_project.tb_chat_room order by registDateTime desc
